EmailTemplate.description: This email is sent to the matching insurer at the point when the case is matched to a specific insurer by CAS member
EmailTemplate.name: OLCNInitialNotificationToTheInsurer
EmailTemplate.subject: REF NO. {!Case.CaseNumber} A new case has been matched
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Case.OLCN_Insurer__c} team,
A new online claim notification has been matched to
{!Case.OLCN_Insurer__c}
Reference number
{!Case.CaseNumber}
Please process and contact the customer in five working days.
Click to open the case
{https://ctpdev01-onlineclaims.cs58.force.com/OnlineClaimNotificaiton} Or open portal? (TBC)
Kind regards
Claims Advisory Service
State Insurance Regulatory Authority p 1300 656 919 www.sira.nsw.gov.au
